img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(6\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d4/Five_Skandhas_%286%29.png)
Hug the wall on the right as you follow the path up to the next set of stairs and a wooden bridge. Cross the wooden bridge, and follow the path as it curves around to the left.
img_below_text:
When you get to the end, you'll see a pathway leading up to the right and white sacs to the left of it. Behind these sacs is a bridge that will take you down to where you want to go.
![Five Skandhas \(8\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/96/Five_Skandhas_%288%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 11 from the file 'How_to_Find_the_Five_Skandhas_and_Unlock_a_Secret_Boss_.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Five Skandhas \(6\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d4/Five_Skandhas_%286%29.png)
Hug the wall on the right as you follow the path up to the next set of stairs and a wooden bridge. Cross the wooden bridge, and follow the path as it curves around to the left."
            - Following Text: "When you get to the end, you'll see a pathway leading up to the right and white sacs to the left of it. Behind these sacs is a bridge that will take you down to where you want to go.
![Five Skandhas \(8\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/96/Five_Skandhas_%288%29.png)"

img_summary:
1. **Summary**:  
The image depicts a dark, rocky environment with white sacs scattered across the area, serving as landmarks. Two red arrows indicate possible paths: one leading left across a bridge and another leading right up a wooden structure. The scene appears to guide players toward navigating the area in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," with the sacs marking key locations for progression.

2. **Purpose/Narrative Role**:  
The image provides visual guidance for players exploring the area described in the preceding and following text. It highlights the pathways and landmarks (white sacs and bridges) necessary to advance further in the game.
